item.title:
RT by @Tony_Surgeon: ICYMI, I recorded a PRIMER mix of wall to wall Surgeon tracks, featuring some of this best and many of my favourites.
https://darkfloor.co.uk/primer001/
item.dc:creator: @DVNT
item.description:

item.title: RT by @Tony_Surgeon: Downwards Records is a label founded in Birmingham, UK in 1993 by future techno luminaries Regis and Female. They released many seminal UK techno records, including @Tony_Surgeon's first. We are honored for this legendary label to make a Hub: https://hubs.ninaprotocol.com/downwards-records
item.dc:creator: @ninaprotocol
item.description: Downwards Records is a label founded in Birmingham, UK in 1993 by future techno luminaries Regis and Female. They released many seminal UK techno records, including @Tony_Surgeon's first. We are honored for this legendary label to make a Hub: hubs.ninaprotocol.com/downwaâ€¦

item.title: RT by @Tony_Surgeon: In case you were wondering what you're letting yourself in for when The Transcendence Orchestra play at our event on the 16th, here's a recording of @Tony_Surgeon @GnodGnetwerk and @dan_bean travelling the spaceways in December last year: https://the-transcendence-orchestra.bandcamp.com/track/live-at-st-john-on-bethnal-green-london
item.dc:creator: @bleep43
item.description: In case you were wondering what you're letting yourself in for when The Transcendence Orchestra play at our event on the 16th, here's a recording of @Tony_Surgeon @GnodGnetwerk and @dan_bean travelling the spaceways in December last year: the-transcendence-orchestra.â€¦

item.title:
RT by @Tony_Surgeon: This weekend we celebrate the life and legacy of Peter Rehberg (Editions Mego / PITA) with a packed 3 day festival of close friends & collaborators. Unmissable!
https://www.cafeoto.co.uk/events/a-tribute-to-peter-rehberg/

item.title:
RT by @Tony_Surgeon: Surgeon was the primary architect of the hugely influential Birmingham Techno sound in the early '90s & has been an integral part of the global Techno scene. We are extremely honored to announce the @Tony_Surgeon Hub:
https://hubs.ninaprotocol.com/surgeon
item.dc:creator: @ninaprotocol
item.description:

item.title:
RT by @Tony_Surgeon: Music is nothing without context.
Since we started Nina our goal has been to create tools that nurture the various contexts of music online.
Today we are one step closer.
Hubs are now live.
https://hubs.ninaprotocol.com/
item.dc:creator: @ninaprotocol
item.description:
Music is nothing without context.

Since we started Nina our goal has been to create tools that nurture the various contexts of music online.

Today we are one step closer.

item.title: RT by @Tony_Surgeon: Uploaded today, from HOG records in 2001, Lockdown EP. For the label art, Chris remembered there is a hole in the middle this time ;-) The breakdown at 3:40 in Mothra sounds evil over a soundsystem - Enjoy https://pauldamagebailey.bandcamp.com/album/hog674-lockdown-ep
item.dc:creator: @Paul_Bailey1881
